mapper.select: SELECT ifnull(max(measure_num), 0) FROM lane_displacement WHERE tag = '1' AND mine_id = #{mineId} AND del_flag = '0' ORDER BY SUBSTRING(measure_num, -4) DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT measure_num FROM lane_displacement as ld
ld.mine_id = #{mineId} AND ld.del_flag = '0'
AND ld.survey_area_name like concat('%',#{surveyAreaName},'%')

SELECT ld.displacement_id AS dataId, ld.measure_num AS measureNum, ld.sensor_type AS sensorType, ld.sensor_location AS sensorLocation, ld.workface_id AS workFaceId FROM lane_displacement ld
ld.mine_id = #{mineId} AND ld.del_flag = '0'
AND ( ld.sensor_location LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR ld.workface_id IN ( SELECT bw.workface_id FROM biz_workface bw WHERE bw.workface_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND bw.del_flag = '0' AND bw.mine_id = #{mineId} ) )
ORDER BY ld.install_time DESC
